name: 2016 The 4th International Conference on Social Science and Management
content: Name of conference: 2016 The 4th International Conference on Social Science and Management (ICSSAM 2016) Date(s) of conference: May 10-12, 2016 ICSSAM 2016 is an international conference for state-of-the-art research in Social Science and Management. It is one of the leading international conferences for presenting novel and fundamental advances in the fields of Social Science and Management. It also serves to foster communication among researchers and practitioners working in a wide variety of scientific areas with a common interest The 4rd International Conference on Social Science and Management - ICSSAM will be held in Osaka, Japan during May 10-12, 2016\. English is the official language of the conference. We welcome paper submissions. Prospective authors are invited to submit full and original research papers which is NOT submitted/published/under consideration anywhere in other conferences and journals. Following the guideline and submit your paper now! Full location details: Osaka International House Foundation--- 2-6 Uehommachi 8-chome, Tennoji-ku, Osaka 543-0001, Japan Key dates (registration, abstract submission etc): Submission Deadline January 20, 2016 Notification of Acceptance February 10, 2016 Registration Deadline/ Final Submission Deadline March 01, 2016 Conference Dates May 10-12, 2016 For more information, please visit: http://icssam.org/ or contact: icssam@icssam.org Organized by Higher Education Forum
